answers.answer: ahh, ive got the exact same thing!and im 24 female. its so annoying. and cant find anything that could be causing it. dr says its not an infection, just an irritation. ive kept a food and drink diary but cant link any connections. il keep u posted if i find/hear anything.gem

Did gemh have a GYN exam too? Obviously pregnancy can cause frequency, but so can fibroids and other GYN disorders. Anything that puts pressure on the bladder can cause frequency. As your doctor probably told you, caffeine is a big culprit. Diabetes can cause frequency, too. Pregnancy and GYN problems cannot cause frequency in a 26 year old male, but caffeine and diabetes can cause it in men as well as women. So can some STD's.

question: so i went to the doctor and did a pee test and it came back fine, but it feels like I have to pee all the time even after i do pee what could be the problem? im a 26 year old male, please HELP!!!!!
title: it feels like i have to pee all the time
